# HyPanel
# https://hypanel.net/llms.txt
# Last Updated: 2025-12-07

> The first complete platform designed specifically for Hytale game servers and communities.

## Project Summary
HyPanel is an all-in-one ecosystem built to support the Hytale community. It integrates server infrastructure, content management, and visual development tools into a single platform, allowing users to create, manage, and scale Hytale servers without deep technical knowledge.

## Core Features

### 1. Server Infrastructure
- **Smart Management:** Automated deployment and scaling of Hytale servers.
- **Multi-World Support:** Manage complex setups like Lobbies, Survival, and Minigames from one dashboard.
- **Performance:** Built on Vercel and modern cloud infrastructure for low latency.

### 2. The Forge (Visual Logic Editor)
- **No-Code Development:** Create game mechanics, quests, and events using a visual node-based editor.
- **Accessibility:** Designed for both beginners and experienced developers to build complex logic without writing code.

### 3. Hytahub Integration
- **Content Marketplace:** Direct integration with Hytahub for one-click installation of mods, maps, and assets.
- **Seamless Management:** Browse and deploy community content directly from the panel.

## Official Links
- **Website:** https://hypanel.net
- **Discord:** https://discord.gg/TrcwkU8x
- **Twitter/X:** https://x.com/HyPanel
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/hypanel
- **Reddit:** https://www.reddit.com/r/HyPanel/
- **Patreon:** https://patreon.com/HyPanel

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend:** Astro, React, Tailwind CSS
- **Icons:** Lucide React
- **Deployment:** Vercel
- **Analytics:** Vercel Analytics, Speed Insights

## Current Status
- **Development Phase:** Active development following Hytale Early Access.
- **Availability:** Preparing for public beta; currently building infrastructure and community foundations.
